overview: Ben Sullins brings 14 years of software development and large scale systems experience to the engineering team at SpotXchange. As VP of Engineering, Ben is focused on bringing quality and reliable technical visions to life, and promoting efficiencies in development and testing activities by defining an agile development approach that matches with the aggressive nature of the industry and our technical visions. Throughout his career, Ben has held numerous leadership positions at Level(3) Communications and has led the development for high volume, highly available software for work flow, data management and order entry systems. Ben is a certified ScrumMaster and has published two books, JMX in Action and the EJB Cookbook. He received a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science from Baylor University and enjoys backpacking with his wife and five children.
